label: The Atrocity of Education, Chapter 4 - Preparation for Democratic Citizenship
description: Typescript chapter from The Atrocity of Education entitled, "Preparation for Democratic Citizenship" by Arthur Pearl where the author argues that the school rather than generating respect for the democratic institutions does the opposite.
